titles.title: Re-Build America Bond Act of 2009
To authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to issue Re-Build America Bonds to finance essential infrastructure projects.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Ways and Means
Referred to House Transportation and Infrastructure
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H1252)
